question: who sings the songs in crazy ex girlfriend
chain_of_thought_result: "Crazy Ex-Girlfriend" features songs performed primarily by the show's star, Rachel Bloom, who plays the lead character, Rebecca Bunch. The show also includes performances by other cast members, such as Vincent Rodriguez III, Donna Lynne Champlin, and Pete Gardner, among others. The music was co-created by Rachel Bloom and Adam Schlesinger, who contributed to the songwriting and production of the songs throughout the series.
